name: Ethics and Professionalism in Forensic Science
description: This course covers three main areas of importance to the forensic scientist and the expert witness: Ethics in forensic science; the scientific theories of proof and evidence including the critical thinking and logic; analysis of how the major philosophical schools of thought impact on forensic science. [24L, 12S] (Priority given first to Forensic Science Specialists and Majors; then Minors.)
